classes.name: Path
classes.description: An object that may be used to locate a file in a file system. Represents a system-dependent file path.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: The string form of this path

methods.description: Returns the string representation of this path.

methods.name: getFileName

returns.description: A path representing the name of the file or directory, or null

methods.description: Returns the name of the file or directory denoted by this path as a Path object.

methods.name: getParent

returns.description: A path representing the parent, or null if this path has no parent

methods.description: Returns the parent path, or null if this path does not have a parent.

methods.name: getRoot

returns.description: A path representing the root component, or null

methods.description: Returns the root component of this path as a Path object, or null if this path does not have a root component.

methods.name: getNameCount

returns.description: The number of name elements in the path

methods.description: Returns the number of name elements in the path.

methods.name: getName

params.name: index
params.description: The index of the name element

returns.description: The name element at the given index

methods.description: Returns a name element of this path as a Path object.

methods.name: subpath

params.name: beginIndex
params.description: The index of the first element, inclusive

params.name: endIndex
params.description: The index of the last element, exclusive

returns.description: A new Path object that is a subsequence of this path

methods.description: Returns a relative Path that is a subsequence of the name elements of this path.

methods.name: startsWith

params.name: other
params.description: The given path

returns.description: True if this path starts with the given path

methods.description: Tests if this path starts with the given path.

methods.name: endsWith

params.name: other
params.description: The given path

returns.description: True if this path ends with the given path

methods.description: Tests if this path ends with the given path.

methods.name: normalize

returns.description: The resulting path, or this path if it does not contain redundant name elements

methods.description: Returns a path that is this path with redundant name elements eliminated.

methods.name: resolve

params.name: other
params.description: The path to resolve against this path

returns.description: The resulting path

methods.description: Resolve the given path against this path. If the other path is absolute, returns the other path. Otherwise, joins this path with the other path.

methods.name: resolve

params.name: other
params.description: The path string to resolve against this path

returns.description: The resulting path

methods.description: Converts the given path string to a Path and resolves it against this path.

methods.name: resolveSibling

params.name: other
params.description: The path to resolve against this path's parent

returns.description: The resulting path

methods.description: Resolves the given path against this path's parent path. Useful for replacing a file name.

methods.name: relativize

params.name: other
params.description: The path to relativize against this path

returns.description: The resulting relative path

methods.description: Constructs a relative path between this path and a given path.

methods.name: toAbsolutePath

returns.description: A Path object representing the absolute path

methods.description: Returns a Path object representing the absolute path of this path.

methods.name: toRealPath

returns.description: An absolute path that represents the real path of the file

methods.description: Returns the real path of an existing file, resolving symbolic links.

methods.name: toFile

returns.description: A File object representing this path

methods.description: Returns a File object representing this path.

methods.name: toUri

returns.description: The URI representing this path

methods.description: Returns a URI to represent this path.

methods.name: compareTo

params.name: other
params.description: The path compared to this path

returns.description: Zero if the argument is equal to this path, a value less than zero if this path is lexicographically less, or a value greater than zero if greater

methods.description: Compares two abstract paths lexicographically.

methods.name: equals

params.name: other
params.description: The object to which this path is to be compared

returns.description: True if the given object represents the same path

methods.description: Tests this path for equality with the given object.

methods.name: isAbsolute

returns.description: True if this path is absolute

methods.description: Tells whether or not this path is absolute.

classes.name: Paths
classes.description: This class consists exclusively of static methods that return a Path by converting a path string or URI.

methods.name: get

params.name: first
params.description: The path string or initial part of the path string

params.name: more
params.description: Additional strings to be joined to form the path string

returns.description: The resulting Path

methods.description: Converts a path string, or a sequence of strings that when joined form a path string, to a Path.

methods.name: get

params.name: uri
params.description: The URI to convert

returns.description: The resulting Path

methods.description: Converts the given URI to a Path object.

classes.name: Files
classes.description: This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on files, directories, or other types of files.

methods.name: exists

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to test

returns.description: True if the file exists

methods.description: Tests whether a file exists.

methods.name: notExists

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to test

returns.description: True if the file does not exist

methods.description: Tests whether the file located by this path does not exist.

methods.name: isDirectory

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to test

returns.description: True if the file is a directory

methods.description: Tests whether a file is a directory.

methods.name: isRegularFile

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to test

returns.description: True if the file is a regular file

methods.description: Tests whether a file is a regular file with opaque content.

methods.name: isReadable

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to check

returns.description: True if the file is readable

methods.description: Tests whether a file is readable.

methods.name: isWritable

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to check

returns.description: True if the file is writable

methods.description: Tests whether a file is writable.

methods.name: isExecutable

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to check

returns.description: True if the file is executable

methods.description: Tests whether a file is executable.

methods.name: size

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

returns.description: The file size, in bytes

methods.description: Returns the size of a file in bytes.

methods.name: createFile

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to create

returns.description: The created file

methods.description: Creates a new and empty file, failing if the file already exists.

methods.name: createDirectory

params.name: dir
params.description: The directory to create

returns.description: The created directory

methods.description: Creates a new directory. The parent directory must already exist.

methods.name: createDirectories

params.name: dir
params.description: The directory to create

returns.description: The created directory

methods.description: Creates a directory by creating all nonexistent parent directories first.

methods.name: createTempFile

params.name: prefix
params.description: The prefix string to be used in generating the file's name

params.name: suffix
params.description: The suffix string to be used in generating the file's name, may be null (.tmp is used)

returns.description: The path to the newly created file

methods.description: Creates an empty file in the default temporary-file directory.

methods.name: createTempDirectory

params.name: prefix
params.description: The prefix string to be used in generating the directory's name

returns.description: The path to the newly created directory

methods.description: Creates a new directory in the default temporary-file directory.

methods.name: delete

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to delete

methods.description: Deletes a file. Throws NoSuchFileException if the file does not exist.

methods.name: deleteIfExists

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to delete

returns.description: True if the file was deleted, false if it did not exist

methods.description: Deletes a file if it exists.

methods.name: copy

params.name: source
params.description: The path to the file to copy

params.name: target
params.description: The path to the target file

returns.description: The path to the target file

methods.description: Copies a file to a target file.

methods.name: move

params.name: source
params.description: The path to the file to move

params.name: target
params.description: The path to the target file

returns.description: The path to the target file

methods.description: Move or rename a file to a target file.

methods.name: readAllBytes

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

returns.description: A byte array containing the bytes read from the file

methods.description: Reads all the bytes from a file.

methods.name: readAllLines

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

returns.description: The lines from the file as a List of Strings

methods.description: Read all lines from a file. Bytes are decoded using the UTF-8 charset.

methods.name: readAllLines

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

params.name: charset
params.description: The charset to use for decoding

returns.description: The lines from the file as a List of Strings

methods.description: Read all lines from a file, decoding bytes using the specified charset.

methods.name: write

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

params.name: bytes
params.description: The byte array to write to the file

returns.description: The path

methods.description: Writes bytes to a file. Creates the file if it does not exist, or truncates it if it does.

methods.name: write

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

params.name: lines
params.description: An iterable of CharSequence lines to write

returns.description: The path

methods.description: Write lines of text to a file. Each line is a CharSequence terminated by the platform line separator.

methods.name: newInputStream

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to open

returns.description: A new input stream

methods.description: Opens a file, returning an input stream to read from the file.

methods.name: newOutputStream

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to open or create

returns.description: A new output stream

methods.description: Opens or creates a file, returning an output stream that may be used to write bytes to the file.

methods.name: newBufferedReader

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to open

returns.description: A new buffered reader

methods.description: Opens a file for reading, returning a BufferedReader to read text using the UTF-8 charset.

methods.name: newBufferedReader

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to open

params.name: charset
params.description: The charset to use for decoding

returns.description: A new buffered reader

methods.description: Opens a file for reading, returning a BufferedReader that may be used to read text from the file using the specified charset.

methods.name: newBufferedWriter

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to open or create

returns.description: A new buffered writer

methods.description: Opens or creates a file for writing, returning a BufferedWriter to write text using the UTF-8 charset.

methods.name: newBufferedWriter

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file to open or create

params.name: charset
params.description: The charset to use for encoding

returns.description: A new buffered writer

methods.description: Opens or creates a file for writing, returning a BufferedWriter that may be used to write text to the file using the specified charset.

methods.name: list

params.name: dir
params.description: The path to the directory

returns.description: A Stream of Path entries in the directory

methods.description: Return a lazily populated Stream of entries in the directory. The listing is not recursive.

methods.name: walk

params.name: start
params.description: The starting file

returns.description: A Stream of Path entries

methods.description: Return a Stream that is lazily populated with Path by walking the file tree rooted at a given starting file.

methods.name: getLastModifiedTime

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

returns.description: A FileTime representing the last modified time

methods.description: Returns a file's last modified time.

methods.name: setLastModifiedTime

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

params.name: time
params.description: The new last modified time

returns.description: The path

methods.description: Updates a file's last modified time attribute.

methods.name: getOwner

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

returns.description: A user principal representing the file owner

methods.description: Returns the owner of a file.

methods.name: getAttribute

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

params.name: attribute
params.description: The attribute to read

returns.description: The attribute value

methods.description: Reads the value of a file attribute.

methods.name: setAttribute

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file

params.name: attribute
params.description: The attribute to set

params.name: value
params.description: The attribute value

returns.description: The path

methods.description: Sets the value of a file attribute.

classes.name: StandardOpenOption
classes.description: Defines the standard open options for opening or creating files.

methods.name: valueOf

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the enum constant to return

returns.description: The enum constant with the specified name

methods.description: Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.

methods.name: values

returns.description: An array containing the constants of this enum type

methods.description: Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

fields.name: APPEND
fields.description: Bytes are written to the end of the file rather than the beginning.

fields.name: TRUNCATE_EXISTING
fields.description: If the file already exists and it is opened for WRITE access, its length is truncated to 0.

fields.name: CREATE
fields.description: Create a new file if it does not exist.

fields.name: CREATE_NEW
fields.description: Create a new file, failing if the file already exists.

fields.name: DELETE_ON_CLOSE
fields.description: Delete the file when the stream is closed.

fields.name: SPARSE
fields.description: Hint to create a sparse file when creating a new file.

fields.name: SYNC
fields.description: Requires that every update to the file's content or metadata is written synchronously.

fields.name: DSYNC
fields.description: Requires that every update to the file's content is written synchronously.

classes.name: StandardCopyOption
classes.description: Defines the standard copy options for copy and move operations.

methods.name: valueOf

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the enum constant to return

returns.description: The enum constant with the specified name

methods.description: Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.

methods.name: values

returns.description: An array containing the constants of this enum type

methods.description: Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

fields.name: REPLACE_EXISTING
fields.description: Replace an existing file if it exists.

fields.name: COPY_ATTRIBUTES
fields.description: Copy attributes to the new file.

fields.name: ATOMIC_MOVE
fields.description: Move the file as an atomic file system operation.
